communicating-with-human-interface-devic.alt: An image showing the Swift logo on the left. Three arrows emerge from it and point to the right. The first arrow points to a game controller. The second arrow points to a mouse. The third arrow points to a keyboard.

abstract.text: Interact with keyboards, mice, and other human interface devices.
